testimonies: “Our families believe this land will host generations of faithful worship.”
“Each contribution is a brick in the home God is building with us.”
“Twalipoka! Together we rise to plant the house of God.”

milestoneVerses.25: John 12:24 — Unless a seed falls to the ground and dies, it remains a single seed.
milestoneVerses.50: Deuteronomy 11:11 — A land of hills and valleys, which drinks water from the rain of heaven.
milestoneVerses.75: Psalm 127:1 — Unless the Lord builds the house, the builders labour in vain.
milestoneVerses.100: Isaiah 56:7 — My house will be called a house of prayer for all nations.
